dcterms:creator: H. Ramirez
B. Maschke
D. Sbarbaro
dcterms:description: A general formulation of irreversible processes with application to the Continuous Stirred Tank Reactor (CSTR). This dataset encompasses a large and general class of irreversible thermodynamic systems.
dcterms:title: Irreversible port-Hamiltonian systems (IPHS)

dcterms:creator: Y. Le Gorrec
H. Zwart
B. Maschke
dcterms:description: Dirac structures and boundary control systems associated with skew-symmetric differential operators, providing a framework for boundary controlled systems.
dcterms:title: Boundary controlled port-Hamiltonian systems (BC-PHS)

dcterms:creator: F. Horn
R. Jackson
dcterms:description: A study on general mass action kinetics, providing foundational insights into diffusion-reaction processes.
dcterms:title: Diffusion-reaction processes

dcterms:creator: A. van der Schaft
D. Jeltsema
dcterms:description: An introductory overview of port-Hamiltonian systems theory, focusing on heat conduction with heat diffusion.
dcterms:title: Heat conduction with heat diffusion

dcterms:creator: H. Ramirez
D. Sbarbaro
B. Maschke
dcterms:description: An irreversible port-Hamiltonian formulation of chemical reaction networks, providing insights into the dynamics of chemical processes.
dcterms:title: Chemical reaction networks
